data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: This picture describes a young girl who is recording the order of guests in a restaurant. From this picture, we can guess that the young girl's occupation is a restaurant waitress. She wears a striped shirt and tie, and a watch on her wrist. This reminds me of my experience of going to a western restaurant with my friend. I was very impressed by the waiter's serious service attitude at that time. Because of her enthusiasm and serious work attitude, I have often visited that store since then. This picture reminds me of my previous experience ordering food in a restaurant.
